forgejo.description:
forgejo is a self-hosted lightweight software forge. Easy to install and low maintenance, it just does the job.

Based on the official docker image: https://codeberg.org/forgejo/-/packages/container/forgejo/12, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/var/lib/postgresql/data.description: forgejo database location. E.g.: create a Share called forgejo-d for this purpose alone.
/var/lib/postgresql/data.label: forgejo db [e.g. forgejo-db]

/data.description: Choose a Share for forgejo data. E.g.: create a Share called forgejo-data for this purpose alone.
/data.label: forgejo data [e.g. forgejo-data]

USER_UID.description: Enter a valid UID to run forgejo with. It must have full permissions to the share mapped in the previous step.
USER_UID.label: UID [e.g.: 1000]

USER_GID.description: Enter a valid GID to run forgejo with. It must have full permissions to the share mapped in the previous step.
USER_GID.label: GID [e.g.: 1000]
